div.p:
Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram ballivis eiusdem xxv die Augusti anno et cetera
lxxviij

Quo die comparens in Judicio nobili viro Alexandro setoune de meldrum ex
vna et Roberto Dogude de achnahuse ex altera partibus que quaedam partes ostende
runt vnum publicum Instrumentum signo et subscriptione Willelmi Keir presbyteri Brechinensis diocesis
notarij publicij vna cum sigillo prouidi viri Johannis scrymgeour dicti jak roborata
et sigillata de et super terris de balkairne cum pertinenciis ac aliis terris in eodem instrumento
expressatis / de quibus Elizabeth de balkairne mater dicti Roberti Dogude
ipsum infeodauit tam in feodo quam in libero tenemento earundum / quam infeodacionem Alexander
hay sponsus dicte Elizabeth approbavit ratificavit et confirmavit in plena curie
coram ballivis burgi de Dunde mediate magno Juramento quod nunquam deueniret
quod huiusmodi infeodacione et resignacione dicto Roberto factas vt in huiusmodi Instrumento plegius
continetur Quod quidem instrumentum dictus Alexander seton peciit a dictis ballivis tran
sumi ac transsumptum sibi desuper discernj / qSuper quibus dicti ballivi mature
auisati eorum decreto interposito cum transsumptum eidem decreuerunt sub forma publica
eorum sigillis sigillatis Testibus Alexandro gordon' de megmar patricio
gordon' de meithlik Roberto blindsel vno balliuorum Willelmo blindsel seniore ma
gistro Johanne hay Rectore de crowdane et domino Roberto leis notario publico
cum multis aliis

The same dai personaly comperit in plane court before Wilyam the hay and Androu
branche twa of the balyeis of Abirdene Wilyame fichet burges of the said
burgh and resignit purely and simply and gaf owyr be the gefine of a wand
in the handis of Androw branch ane of the balyeis forsaid the frank tenement
of al and sindre the landis croftis and annuale rentis that pertenyt til him / of the
quhilkis he infeft and possessit Jonet fichet his doghtir lang tyme of
before / togiddir with al rycht and clame of rycht that he had has or may
haf tharof in tyme tocum In fauour of the said Jonet fichet his doghtre
and of his gude son' in law thomas symson hir spous' than beand present
the quhilk beand done the said Androw branche balye / the franktenment
of al and sindre the saidis landis croftis and annuel rentis and al rycht and cla
me of rycht of the said William fichet as forsaid is / purely and simply
gaf to the said Jonet fichet and thomas symson hir spous' be the deli
uering of the said wand til thaim and ilkane of thaim in takyne tharof
Nocht withstanding the said Jonet fichetis rycht gevin til hir of before
the quhilk the said Wilyam hir fadir ratifiit and approvit / and for the
mare habundans and securite ratifiis and approvis be this present
write / wpon' the quhilkis thomas symson for him and his said spouse
askit ane testimoniale tobe made vndir the seelis of the saidis
balyeis / before thir witnes' gilbert of chavmer Alexander trail James
of Kyntor mawnus Wormot John' fichet yungar Allan' smyth and
philp of Dunbrek seriand with vtheris diuers'

Item the said day the baxtaris was chargit be the balyeis eftir the deliuerence
of the aldirman and consale to kepe xiiij vncis of bakyn brede the penny
laif and the twa peny laif thareftir of xxviij vncis vndir pane of eschete
of the brede and expelling of thaim fra the craft

Willelmus sprunt amerciatur per concessionem propriam pro iniusta perturbacione thome baxtar
et emendabit eidem ut Jura volunt

Vicesimo octauo die Augusti anno predicto accedens personaliter coram preposito et balliuis in pretorio
matheus edwardson filius et heres quondam Johannis edwardson' burgensis de abirdene
fecit constituit creauit et solempniter ordinauit suos procuratores prouidos viros videlicet Duncanum
sanchar' de murcroft thomam symson' Willelmum blindsel seniorem Willelmum blindsele
iuniorem et Alexandrum sanchar' coniunctim et diuisim ad prosequendum et defendendum terras et possessiones
quascumque sibi pertinenciis coram quibuscumque Judicibus legalibus infra pretorium huius burgi aut extra
et in omnibus aliis causis placitis aut debatis sibi qualitercumque incumben' cum potestate perdend'
et lucrand' Et promisit de Rato Judicio sisto et Judicatum soluj cum ceteris clausulis in
latera forma procuratorij

Die prima mensis Septembris anno Domini et cetera lxxviijmo Willelmus hay et Andreas branche
duo balliuorum huius burgi cum quibusdem aliis de consilio tunc presentibus continuauerunt deci
sionem certificacionis presentate per Jacobum crag In causa mota inter eum et Jacobum
cumyng penes viiijto vlnas et iij quartar de li chamblot per dictum
Jacobum cumming clamatum vsque die veneris proximo futuro videlicet quartum diem
instantis mensis septembris cum consensu parcium propter debilitatem consilij tenta non presentis

The second day of septembre the consale and merchandis of this burgh beand gadirit
with the aldirman in the tolbuth' has consentit til the sending of ane ambaxiat
fra our soueran lord to the Duke of Burgunye for the gude of merchandis'
And at the command of our souerane lordis lettres thai haf ordanit that v personis
of worthy burgess' of the ton' sal pass' with the Aldirman tobe in Edinburgh
the vij day of this instant moneth' to avise with our souerane lordis consale ande
the commissaris of vthiris burrowis wpon the sending of the said ambaxiate
And that certane taxis salbe made and rasyt topay the expens' of the aldir
man and of the persons that sal pass' with him And topay rychtswa to the
contribucion of our Souerane lordis Ambassate as siclike burrowis of
the Realm' sal do for the caus' forsaid
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio quarto die septembris anno et cetera lxxviijuo

Eodem die ob fauorem et litteratum requestum venerabilis viri magistri Alexandri
Inglis cancellarij Abirdonensis / Alexander de camera prepositus et persone subsequentes
de consilio dicti burgi videlicet Andreas scherar Dauid colison' Johannes
de Knollis Robertus culan Robertus blindsel Dauid symson patricius bade
nagh Dauid menyes Johannes Wormot andreas branche Dauid matho
son' gilbertus de camera thomas prat et Adam de crafurde consesserunt
et vnanimj assensu promiserunt discreto viro magistro thome de stra
thachin magistro scolaris huius burgi / primam vacaturam cuiuscumque
seruicij ad eorum disposicionem et dicti burgi spectan' et pertinen' / quam
idem magister thomas optare voluerit et sibi competen' et cetera

Quia decisio certificacionis aliis presentate coram balliuis per Jacobum crag in causa
mota inter eum et Jacobum cumyng continuata fuit cum consensu parcium vsque in
hodiernum diem / comparens igitur prefatus Jacobus crag ostendit et publice in curia
plegi fecit dictam certificacionem sub sigillis prepositi et duorum ballivorum de
elgyne tenorem qui sequitur continen' To al and sindri to quhais knaulege
thir present lettres salcum James of Douglas aldirman of Elgyne James
Stewart and John' falconer' ballies of the sammyn greting in god euerlesting
Sen merite is tobere lele witnesing to the suthefastnes and specalie
in casis that may gener preiudice to Innocent persons herfor wit your vni
uersite that we bere witnes faithfully be thir our present lettres that James
crag burges of Abirdene had ane stik of blak chamelote conte
ning aucht eln' and ane half in the fare of Elgyne on the trinite
day last by past / quhilk stik we stollin fra him in the said fare as
is previt sufficiently before ws in Jugement And certane persons handlit
that war haldin suspect in the steling of the said stik of chamlot And
atour the said James crag rasit lettres aggrauatouris apon the persons
that stal the said chamlot and made thaim tobe put in execucion al
festual dais sen syne and yeit continualy out throch the diocy of mur
ray / the quhilk til al and sindri quham it efferis we mak knawin
be thir present lettres to the quhilkis we haf affixt our selis to thir present
lettres at Elgyne the xj day of August the yer' of god M iiij C
lxxviij yeris / Post cuius quidem certificacionis presentate ostensionem pariter et lecturam prepositus
et ballivi per decretum curie deliberauerunt eandem valida fore et sufficien'
et dictum Jacobum crag quitum de clameo Jacobi cumyng penes li chame
lot supradict' et cetera

Item eodem die Jacobus de Kintor primo die vocatus per philippum Dunbrek seriandum
ad comparendum responsurus plegio super ipsum extenso per Alexandrum mowat de lostragij pro
iniusta detencione trium barellarum salmonum / non comparuit et cetera

vxor thome bening et Richardus filius eiusdem amerciantur pro perturbacione Duncanj stra
logh sergeandi suum officium excercentis ut compertum fuit per assisam

The ix day of septembre the yer' of god et cetera lxxviij yeris / thomas browne litstar
before the balyeis in the tolbuthe producit for witnes be thom of bening litstar'
anent a lede debatable betuix the said thomas bening on that a part And John'
fichet yungar and Anny his spous' on that othir part / becaus' of the said thom brov
nys passing oute of the toune / at the command of the balyeis he beand sworn'
the gret aith deponit and declarit / that he was present herd and saw / quhen the
said Anny the spous' vmquhile of Adam litstar and now til the said John' fichet
askit fra the said thom of bening thre pundis perofferand to deliuer him the lede
he payand the said sowme / the quhilk he sayis scho perofferit til him oft and
mony tymis a yer' syne / eftir that he herd the said thom bening speke til hir'
of the said lede / that he wald haf had it / sayand / that scho wald haf had
als' ere the iij li' as the lede

Quo die thomas symson' dedit Simonem de craufurd plegium legalem pro eo
quod adam androson' erit indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris Et eodem gilbertus
de camera deuenit plegius legalis pro dicto Adam de indempnitate prefati thome et cetera

Item thomas symson' inuenit Simonem crafurd plegium legalem pro eo quod Jacobus cummyng
erit indempnes aliter quam per viam Juris Et similiter magister Willelmus anffray deuenit
plegius legalis pro Jacobo cumyng de indempnitate thome symson' ut supra

In the balye court of the burgh of Abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe the xj day of the moneth
of septembre forsaid It wes fundin and deliuerit be ane sworn' assise that henry sille
mare maistir vndir god of a schip of trailsownde sulde and is haldin tocontent
John' starret ster'man of the said schip / of his furyng hamewart that is
of x barellis and the twa part of a barel And for the wrangwis' withhal
ding tharof the said skippar wes adiugit in amerciament of the court and tocontent the
said John' as law wil et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram Willelmo hay vno balliuorum dicti burgi
xviijo die Septembris anno prescripto

quo die Jacobus de Kyntor secundo die
vocatus ad sectam patricij badenagh procuratorio nomine Alexandri mowet de lostra
gy pro detencione iii barellarum salmonum / non comparuit Igitur precipitur philippo Dunbrek serian
do capere districtum

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xxv die
mensis Septembris anno Domini et cetera lxxviijuo

The quhilk day Williame cuming masar til our souerane lord the king pro
testit throu vertu of his office / that gif the action' of law borowis of
peis' breking persewit be William cumming of culter his fadir wpon'
thomas symson' pertenis nocht to this court that quhat the assise did
anent the determinacion' and decisione of the said actione sulde turne the
king til na preiudice in tyme tocum na It mycht be persewit in our souerane
lordis Justice are / the quhilk protestacion was made before the deliuerence
of the assise chosin to the decisione of the said caus'

The same day comperand in Jugement / thomas prat forspekar' for
henrik sellemere skippar' of ane schip of trailsownd and for
thomas androson' / and perofferit in thare namys before the aldirman
and balyeis sittand in Jugement til vndirly the law of the said burgh
in al actionis and clames that thare marchandis and frauchtismen
of Edinburgh had to say til thame to one ane of thaim / And til
vndirly the law within thre tydis as sey farand men and til do
thame right eftir the tenor' of thare chartir party made betuix
the saidis parties

Item the said day Thomas prat forspekar' for / otto desko skippar'
of a schip of trailsownd perofferit before the aldirman and balyeis
in Jugement til vndirly the law before thame as Jugis of law
in al actionys and clamys that his merchandis and frauchtismen had
or mycht hafe til him / and for to do law and rycht eftir the tenour of his
chartir party and his frauchtismenis the aldirman and balyeis perofferand
to do law to the saidis parties et cetera

Item eodem die thomas symson accusatus de infrictione plegiorum legalium
super Willelmum cuming de cultyr negavit dictam calumpniam vnde huiusmodi
actio posita fuit ad assisam proborum burgensium infrascriptorum videlicet Andree scherar'
Dauid colison' Roberti culan Alexandri rede Johannis Wormot gilberti
Vaus Dauid mathoson' thome prat gilberti morison' Alexandri hay et
gilberti lethe / qui Jurati et inter se vnde et mature auisati parcium
allegacionibus et racionibus auditis et intellectis inuenerunt et decreuerunt quod
dictus thomas symson' fuit infrictor plegiorum legalium super prefa
tum Willelmum cuming de culter et de hoc nequint' eum acquietare et cetera

The same dai Dauid colison' thomas prat Dauid mathoson' and gilbert lech
arbitrouris chosin betuix John' neilson' burges of montros on that a part
and Richard henrison burges of Abirden on that vthir parte / Riply avisit
decretit and deliuerit / that al thingis comptit and reknit betuix the parties forsaidis
the said Richard henrison' sal pay of cler til the forsaid John' neleson
ellevyn pundis twelf s' wpon' the quhilkis the parties ar appointit
that Richard henrison sal pay now in hand to the said John' neilsone
fyve pundis and the sex pundis xij s' remanand at mertymes nixt tocum
for the quhilkis vj li' xij s' tobe pait as said is Alexander of chavmer aldirman
of Abirdene is becumin borgh til the said John' neilson'
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio xxviij die septembris anno predicto

quo die
Willelmus burges conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione Relicte quondam Donaldi
skynnar' vnde assisa ordinavit ipsium pro emenda ad Dauid Dimidium libre cere
ad missam sancti sanguinis celibrantur ad altare beati Nicholai et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus forteth adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento pro plegio extenso per Alexandrum card
ny prelocutorem suum asseren' thomam raburn facere aut negare debere calumpniam
suam vnius equj et cetera pro eo quod Regrariacio eiusdem plegij fuit valida ut wardat'
fuit per curiam et cetera

Vltimo die mensis Septembris predicte predictus Johannes lambynton' adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento
curie pro iniusta perturbacione Antonij scissorum in verbo et emendabit eidem et cetera

Johannes fichet manens in vico nauium deuenit plegius legalis pro Johanne lammyntone
quod Antonius scissor erit indempnes aliter quam per viam Juris Et idem Antonius de
dit Dauid mar plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate Johannis lammynton' ut supra

head.add: Alexander chalmer alderman maister of wark to the bigging of the queyr

div.p:
The same dai thir' persons of the consale vndirwritin and vthir part of the gilde of this
burgh that is tosay Johne of marr' Robert of culan Dauid symson Alexander
howison thomas of chavmer alexander rede gilbert the vaus' John' the vaus thom
prat William the hay James cumming Dauid Kyntor Dauid mathoson' adam
of craufurd and Angus ihoneson / has consentit and ordanit that Alexander of chavmyr
Aldirman be continevit vppir and principale maistir of wark of the biging of
sanct Nicholace qveyr / for twa yeris tocum And that ser Androw Wricht or
ony vthir that ressavis the siluer procurit and pertening to the said wark sal mak
compt tharof to the said Alexander of chavmer / And he tobe responsale and dettour
tharfor to the toune et cetera

Item the fornemit persons at the instance of Alexander of chavmer aldirman forsaide has
with ane assent and consent grantit and promittit til Alexander of forbes the Aldirman
gude son' that he sal haf the next vacande of wattir' or lande perten
ing to this burgh of Abirdene that may vake of Reson' et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et Willelmo hay vno balliuorum huius
burgi secundo die octobris anno et cetera lxxviiiuo /

quo die Jacobus de Kyntor'
tercio die sepe vocatus ad sectam Alexandri mowat de loscragy aut eius procuratoris
pro iij barrellis salmonum non comparuit et cetera licet per Duncanum straloch seriandum fuerat sepe vocatus ut supra

In the court of the burgh of Abirdene b haldin in the tolbuthe be the aldirman and bal
yeis of the same the thrid day of october' forsaid Thomas prat forspekar
for thomas andirson as skippar of a schip of trailsound folowit be a
borgh matho Windigatis henry Walkar' Dauid mak and Robert
of craufurd his frauchtismen of the wrangwis halding of his
fraught and lyin gilt eftir the tenour of the chartir party maid betuix the
saidis parties The quhilkis persons frauchtismen be thare forspekare
Dauid menyes denyande the said chalance / the action forsaid was
put til ane assise of thir personis that is tosay Dauid colison' Robert
of culan alexander howison Dauid symson alexander rede gilbert the vaus'
John' Wormot William blindsel yungar Johne the vaus gilbert
of chavmer Dauy mathoson thomas scrogs and Wat thomson Quhilkis
the gret aith sworn the allegacions and resons of the parties herd
and vndirstandin and tharupon riply avisit fand and declarit / the forsaidis
personis frauchtismen quyte of the wrangwis' halding of the said
fraucht and lyin gilt quharfor the said thomas andirson was adiu
git in amerciament of the court and the fornemit persons frauchtismen
quyte of his chalance quhil thai be festnyt with new sute et cetera

Item dominus Andreas scheres capellanus altaris beate marie virginis in ecclesia parrochiali beati
Nicholai constituit thomam de camera suum legitimum procuratorem ad Juridice prosequendum
et recuperandum per processus nomine ipsius constitutis et dicti altaris quandam terram
Jacentem in li greyn / pro ij s' annuj redditus debito annuatim predicto altari et a
longo tempore non soluto in latissima forma procuratore et cetera

Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per prepositum et
balliuos dicti burgi subsequen' quinto die mensis octobris videlicet die Juridico
proximo post festum beati michaelis archangeli Anno Domini mc iiijcmo lxxviijuo
quo die sectam vocata et curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Andreas scherar electus fuit ad officium prepositure Et thomas
de camera Alexander rede alexander chavmyr filius et Johannes stevynsoune
electi fuerunt in officio balliuorum Ac Johannes Waus alexander chavmer philip
pus de Dunbrek Dauid Duncani et Duncanus stralogh electi et continuati
fuerunt in seriendos huius burgi pro anno futuro quorum quilibet prestitit solitum Juramentum

Die sexta mensis octobris predicto Actio summonicionis prosecuta per gilbertum de camera
aduersus Johannem androson vigore litterarum domini nostri Regis aliis de consensu dicti
gilberti et Willelmi andree filij et heredis apparentis prefati Johannis ac procuratorum
eiusdem continuatur adhuc de nouo continuatur cum consensu eorundem modo et forma
quibus nunc stetit vsque inter huic et festum beati martinj proximo futuro expectando
aduentum predicti Johannis andree et si medio tempore non aduenerit Idem Wil
elmus procurator prefati patris sui respondebit ad instanciam dicti gilberti secundum
formam et tenorem huiusmodi litterarum summonicionis dominj Regis prout et in quantum de Jure debet
et tenetur Testibus Alexandro menyes Johanne de mar Dauid mathosoune
Willelmo hay et macolmo mowat burgensibus cum alijs

Crastina die in curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio Elizabeth sanquhare
adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione et lesione Mariote manen'
iuxta eandum et tenetur emendare parti lese ut Jura volunt vnde ordi
natum fuit quod in parte emende dabit eadem elisabeth prefate mariote
duos s' pro quibus soluendos Johannes colison deuenit plegius Et si futuris tempor
ibus inueniatur quod taliter delinquat exuletur ab hac villa et punietur
eciam in bonis suis / et Idem Judicium erit de prefata mariota equo

Curia de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem viijuo die
octobris anno predicto /

quo die thomas chapman fatebatur in curia se / ha
buisse cedulam mandati a Willelmo blinschel iuniore / ad emendum sibi et
imponendum in naue Johannis fichet xxxij barrellas farine siliginis / de quibus
dictus Willelmus acquisiuit nisi xiij barellas farine per dictum thomam in
predicta naue carcat'

Eodem die thomas chapman adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento pro plegio per ipsum
iniuste extenso super Johannem fichet nautam penes foras detencionem
certarum barellarum farine siliginis Willelmi blindsele iunioris de naue
sua de quibus idem thomas mercator extitit pro dicto Willelmo et ipse quitus
per assisam

Dauid mak conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi barbour'
et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum virorum Et ordinatum fuit quod dabit
j libram cere ad missam sancti sanguinis et xl s' voluntatem prepositi et cetera

Nicholaus mason' in amerciamento pro iniusta abducacione et capcione seruitorum Jacobi de
Kyntor ab opere suo

The same day the action debatable betuix thomas spawdy mastir of a
schip callit Anton' of Dunde on that a part And thomas prat burges of
Abirdene with his complicis merchandis on that othir part / anent the clame of
bawlast and lyin dais made be the said skippar et cetera was summittit be
the parties til Androw rede of badfothellis John' Wormot William blind
sel yungar' Dauid mathoson and thomas scrogs sworn' as in ane as
sise / the parties beand oblist be thar' athez to vndirly thar' decret /
quhilkis Riply avisit deliuerit that Thomas prat and his falowschip
ar' quite of the said mastiris clame of his bawlast forthir than was
apon his schippis bothum / and of lyine dais rychtsa / And thai fand that
the bil present be the skippar vndir thomas prattis signet was of na
vail Attour thai haf ordand the chartir party tobe made eftir the fourm
of the bil present be thomas prat

John' symson' in amerciament for the wrangwis' streking of a borch on
the sterisman quhilk is ordanit be the assise toserue in the schip of
montros' et cetera
thomas scrogis amerciatur pro perturbacione curie in disposicione vicini suj

Item the assise fyndis and deliueris that quhat gudis ar' optenit be thom
chapman and thomas scrogis in siluer and penny worthis / that thom of marris
wif sal haf the ferd part / scho makand and payand siclike costis
for hir ferd part / as thai haf done for thare ferd part to this day
And as to the state takin of lande / be thomas scrogis / thai fynd
that he salbe responsale for the remanent of the obligacion made betuix
him and thom chapman to the lave of thar falowis that is
tosay thom of mar' and Wil moyses of xxx li' Attour the assise fynouris grantit
be thom of scrogis in his hand xxvij li' And in the handis of thom chepman
and Wil moyses xviij li' in claith of the quhilk the said thom of marris
wif suld haf hir ferd part / the costis strikyn of et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et balliuis eiusdem nono
die mensis octobris anno Domini lxxviijuo

The quhilk dai Wil harpar' Johne Westland and Johne matland accusit
for the wrangwis' cuming vndir nycht in Johne henrisonis hous' in futy bre
king of his durris and taking oute of his gude j barrel of bere and j pynt
at thar awin hand / eftir that thai askit tobe avisit tomak answere / be
thare forspekar' gilbert of chavmer put thaim in wil of the aldirman and
baillies anent the said chalance / for the quhilk ilkane of thaim was ad
iugit in amerciament of this court and til amend as law wil et cetera
Willelmus seruitor Willelmi malisson amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione vxoris thome og et cetera

Appreciatores carnium Jurati pro anno futuro / Jacobus clerk Johannes
chapman gener quondam Angusij lilburn thomas iamyson' Alanus smyth Simon
gardin Johannes skynnar' Dauid talyour henricus quhitbrou Willelmus Dunbrek

Gustatores ceruisie primo pro le crukit quartar Nicholaus liel et geor
gius Dis' Item pro vico viridi Alexander huchouson' et Johannes Kymdy
In quarterio de futy Johannes Dys' et thomas talyour

The same dai the browstaris warnit and comperand in the tolbuth war'
chargit be the aldirman and balyeis at the ordinance of the consale that
fra thyne furth for this yer' thai sel na ail derrer than for viij d'
the galloun' that be gude of the price vndir the pane of viij s' vnfor
gevin for the first and secund tyme that thai be convict of the contrar And
at the thrid tyme thar lede tobe brokyn' and bannyst fra the craft

Item anent the amendis making to the toune for the offens done be Wil
harpar Johne Westland and John' matland as is aboue writin / the for
saidis persons beand sworn' tovndirly and fulfil the ordinance of the aldirman
and counsale quhilkis has deliuerit and ordand / that becaus' the offens
is gret In the first or thai gang oute of the tolbutht ilkane of
thaim sal pay j li' of walx to the haly blude licht And on Sondai
next tocum in sanct Nicholace kirk at the offeratour of the hie mess'
thai salcum barehede and barfute with a wax candil in ilkane of
thar handis and offir Ande ask a bailye forgifnes in name of the ton'
for thare offens And attour' topay ilkane xl s' at the wil
of the aldirman et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xijo
die mensis octobris anno Domini et cetera lxxviijuo

The quhilk dai comperit in the court thomas andirson as skippar'
in that part of a schip of trailsound of the quhilk henrik sillemere
was governour in his absence / and be his forspekar thomas prat re
hersit and sayde in presence of his frauchtismen / that of the hendir ende
of his fraucht he ressauit this day l s' of the quhilkis thare
was deliuerit til him in the court apon the common kyst xx s' And
sa he grantis him pait of the hail fraucht of the busch of trailsound
wpon' the quhilk payment of his fraucht nocht fullely content quhil
this day as said is / he askit the record of the court in presence of
Johne Wormot William the hay William Kintor Wil moyses
thom chapman John malisson' and Wil necolson' with vthiris diuers'

Item the same day it was ordand and deliuerit be ane sworn' assise
that henric sillemer' and sa mony of his schipmen as ar' on life sal
cum and swere that thai skathit nocht the merchandis of the said schip
of a certane of Ry clamyt be thaim / And that sworn thai salbe
quite And the merchandis salbe quite of the payment of the fraucht
of samekil as thai wil swere that thai wawnt

megota coly per concessionem propriam amerciatur pro propinacione seruisie viij d' postquam
appreciate fuit pro vj d'

Item Relicta Johannis Duncanj vxor Edmundi hay Robertus Kintor ex
parte vxoris sue et Dauid howison nomine sponse sue amerciatur pro con
cessiones proprias pro infrictione precij impositi super ceruisiam venalem et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus quelp conuictus per assisam adiudicatus fuit in duobus
amerciatis in vno videlicet pro iniusta lesione Andree luss' et in alio pro
perturbacione magistri thome de Kintor et tenetur emendare ad visum proborum
Et dictus andreas in amerciamento pro perturbio ipsius Willelmi verbotenus et cetera
